content.description: Refer to the following slides. The slides show two views of the same work.
content.question: The artistic movement with which this work is associated typically strives for all of the following EXCEPT

choices.label: a challenge to the traditional gallery system
continued use of traditional sculpture materials
a dialogue between the work and the site

content.answer: continued use of traditional sculpture materials

topic.text: 4.2: Purpose and Audience in Later European and American Art

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Explain how artistic decisions about form, style, materials, content, function, and/or context of a work of art (or group of related works of art) elicit a response or shape its reception.
